entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
